title: Subpart 351-2 - Requirements for Persons Required to Collect Tax, Store Operators, Owners of Enclosed Shopping Malls, and Manufacturers
content:
Subpart 351-2 - Requirements for Persons Required to Collect Tax, Store Operators, Owners of Enclosed Shopping Malls, and Manufacturers

State Regulations
§ 351-2.1 - Prohibitions
§ 351-2.2 - Sale of reusable bags by stores
§ 351-2.3 - Film plastic collection and recycling responsibilities of stores
§ 351-2.4 - Manufacturer responsibilities

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
